programme.title: I Told You So
programme.desc: Confined to a wheelchair after a failed Halloween attempt to prove herself a reporter, What's At Heart photographer Emma sees strange goings-on through her hospital window. She's convinced the neighbors are jewel thieves, but no one believes her – till the bad guys come after her! To show her Friends on the What's At Heart school paper that she's more than just a photographer, Emma investigates a scary old house on Halloween eve -- only to take a tumble and land in the hospital. There, confined to a wheelchair, she observes mysterious goings-on through her window which convince her that the neighbors are jewel thieves. Her friends, though dubious, agree to check it out. But after nearly getting caught by the neighbors, they come up empty and decide it's all just Emma's imagination. Meanwhile, up in Maternity, Sophie's having a baby! The girls run out, leaving Emma alone. And that's when the bad guys decide to pay Emma a visit…

programme.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon. In his most villainous attempt at using the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates a vortex through space and time to return to the moment Wu first arrives to recruit Kai to become a ninja (Episode 1, 2011) in order to rid the ninja from the future. The Ninja follow him back in time, only to make the mistake in saving Nya from the Skeletons. Suddenly, Past Kai doesn't have a need to become a ninja, so our current day heroes must fix the past to save their futures. The stakes rise as Garmadon catches wind the Ninja have followed him back in time and plans a dangerous trap. In a final battle, the ninja use the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon, causing all of the legendary weapons to shoot off into the night sky. In the end, our heroes return back to the present and learn the Mega-Weapon has ceased to exist because it was destroyed in the past, leaving them all without their elemental powers.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a ‘Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a ‘Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a ‘Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more ‘Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Festival Of Sugary Sweets
programme.desc: When a sugar shortage threatens the annual Festival of Sugary Sweets, the Lalaloopsy friends devise a delicious way to save the day and discover that when you work together as a team, you can make something really special.

programme.title: S03 E08
programme.sub-title: The Berry Best Treasure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is being driven to distraction! She can't finish a song that she promised to write for a singing group, thanks to the earsplitting noise from Berrykin construction crews who are trying to find the sparkleberry juice blockage that has shut down the town's power. Strawberry can't cook in the café, Lemon's hair salon appliances are running out of control—life in Berry Bitty City is impossible! Strawberry rallies their spirits by suggesting a fun way for them to spend the day out of town: a treasure hunt! She describes a game where the girls divide into two teams, and each team creates fun written clues for the other that lead to funny objects the girls must collect.

programme.title: S03 E09
programme.sub-title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest! Rallied by a sense of competition and adventure, the girls divide into three groups and set up tents—each convinced they will be the bravest group. They each come up with diverting activities to distract themselves.

programme.title: S02 E02
programme.desc: To win gold at the Ooze-lympics, Avery goes to Chef Dufflet Rosenberg's kitchen to make Molten Chocolate Lava Cake. Lily gets fresh honey at a bee farm. For the final event, Matt challenges them to make extra-oozy, stuffed pizzas.

programme.title: S02 E03
programme.sub-title: Foods that are Hot - Taste Buds
programme.desc: Lily drops in on Chef Lily Pottinger to make a classic spicy Jamaican dish, Jerk Chicken. Avery tests his tolerance for hot peppers at a hot sauce store. Then it's back to the kitchen to see whose fiery wings will bring Matt to tears.

programme.title: S01 E02
programme.sub-title: Susannah's Pillow, A Show For Susannah, The Lost Toy - Guess What
programme.desc: EP04: It's time for a nap but, but Violette cannot find her pillow...EP05: Oh! The mischievous little Thunder Fairy sets off a big storm simply to prevent Rigolini the clown from performing his juggling act in front of Violette the Farmer. EP06: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at Violette's farm. Everyone is getting annoyed with the little puppy Hot Dog who wants to play all the time, while no on has time to for him.

programme.title: S01 E03
programme.sub-title: Too Hot For Super Fred, A Piece of Cake for Thunder Girl, Bouquet For Blossom - Guess What
programme.desc: EP07: Today it's oh so hot and Violette has prepared a nice picnic, right near the well for Tijinou, Tijibelle et Super Hero. She takes out the picnic from her backpack. But a surprise guest joins them ... Thunder Fairy!EP08: It's very hot today at Violette's farm. The sun is shining and there's not enough water coming out of Violette's tap to water her kitchen garden.EP09: Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive at Violette's farm and ask Violette to sing them a song! But Violette is shy!

programme.title: Band Together
programme.desc: Jewel learns that Keys Sharps 'N' Flats wants to become a pop star, and helps her create a new band.

programme.title: S03 E10
programme.sub-title: The Berry Lucky Day - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play—a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park. With Huck on his way, Cherry practices her singing. She believes her ability to hit a perfect high note is the result of a good luck charm—a beautiful crystal — that she keeps in her pocket. Although Strawberry says singing isn't about luck, but about practice and hard work, Cherry isn't convinced.

programme.title: S03 E11
programme.sub-title: All Dogs Allowed - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away! For some strange reason, they want nothing to do with the dog park! No matter how the girls call them to come in, the pups hesitate and back away, with worried whines. Cherry tries to tempt them by hiding doggie treats around the park, but the pups just run in, snatch the treats and run out. Debate begins about why the pups won't enter the park. Everyone has their own theory. Strawberry wonders if something is scaring them. Blueberry concludes it's Lemon's ice sculpture.

programme.title: S01 E15
programme.sub-title: Indiana Pac and the Temple of Slime - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: An ancient artifact once belonging to Pac's parent's leads to a temple within a maze that may hold the secret to the Tree of Life.

programme.title: S01 E16
programme.sub-title: Driver's Pac - PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
programme.desc: Pac fails his driver's license test because of a ridiculously strict Hovering Vehicles Department employee, Mr. Strickler. Then, to save Pac-World, Pac has to fly the Paccerchini into the Netherworld, but because he only has a learner's permit, Mr. Strickler is reluctantly taken along for the ride.

programme.title: S03 E06
programme.sub-title: The Littlest Berrykin - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, “The Littlest Berrykin,” into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. But before leaving, they must choose which of their three princesses (played by Lemon, Raspberry and Strawberry in royal gowns) will rule the kingdom.

programme.title: S03 E07
programme.sub-title: The Berry Big Relay Race - Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the “retrieve” part of the activity—as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search. Orange finds Strawberry, Plum and Raspberry in Lemon's salon, getting their hair and nails done, but something starts going terribly wrong with the appliances.

programme.title: S01 E13
programme.desc: When her store-bought taco shells crack into a gazillion pieces, Lily cooks up a batch of home made taco shells that crunch without cracking. Meanwhile, Avery investigates how chickens lay eggs without cracking them, and makes a trip to see some of the biggest eggs of all – at an ostrich farm! Then our hosts take a crack at cooking each other's favourite omelet, and the results have Matt cracking up!

programme.title: Challenge Squad | Slimy Games!
programme.desc: Challenge Squad takes on the most epic challenges, featuring your favorite YouTube stars!

programme.title: LankyBox | Roblox Rangers!
programme.desc: LankyBox is Roblox superstars Justin and Adam, two best friends who love playing popular video games!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Tricks and Treats!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: JillianTubeHD | Pancake Princess!
programme.desc: Join YouTube star, JillianTubeHD, as she makes everything from delicious desserts to gold, glittery slime!

programme.title: KidCity | Gaming Bonanza!
programme.desc: Play along with the KidCity family —Little Flash, Ava, DadCity, and MomCity— in all their kid-friendly games!

programme.title: Onyx Family | Vampire Visitor!
programme.desc: Onyx Family is best known for their spooky skits, starring the Onyx Kids: Shiloh, Shasha, Sinead, and Shalom.

programme.title: Future Card Buddy Fight
programme.desc: It is the year 2030, and the stage is the capital of Japan, Chou-Tokyo. Through "Buddyfight", humans have started cultural interactions with residents from other worlds called "Affinity Dimensions". Buddyfight is a game with selected humans as the "Buddyf

programme.title: Pincode
programme.desc: Grown up Kikoriki characters rock the world with their scientific superpowers and tell the kids scientific facts in a most entertaining way. The crew follows Captain Pin as they learn about the world we live in and share this knowledge with us.

programme.title: Camp Spoopy
programme.desc: Pumpkins, goblins and candy...and a puppy in a ghost costume?! Stay right here on Camp Spoopy for all your Halloween scares!

programme.title: The Pirates Next Door
programme.desc: A small town's quiet life is suddenly turned upside down by the arrival of a family of pirates! For Matilda, her new neighbors are a dream come true! With Jim Lad, the Jolley-Rogers' son, around, there's no chance of getting bored.

programme.title: Drakers
programme.desc: Racing At High Speeds At All Times!

programme.title: VIP Pets
programme.desc: We are the VIP Pets! The coolest pets with a passion for hair! We are best friends and together we will discover lots of beautiful hairstyles and go on exciting adventures!

programme.title: Tik Tak Tail
programme.desc: Tik Tak Tail es una triple desventura de Tik el conejo, Tak el tigre y Tail su cola. El avispado conejito tiene mucho trabajo porque Tak siempre quiere comérselo y Tail no deja de echarle el ojo a sus zanahorias.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep
programme.desc: It's countryside chaos as Shaun The Sheep returns to the small screen with his very own series. Peace in the valley turns to mayhem in the meadow as Shaun leads his flock into all sorts of scrapes and scraps, running rings around sheepdog Bitzer when the Farmer's back is turned.

programme.title: Animal Jam
programme.desc: Just think, all your favorite furry friends together right here for one animal packed hour, including: “KikoRiki” “Talking Angela,“and “Talking Tom Heroes.”

programme.title: Camp Spoopy
programme.desc: Pumpkins, goblins and candy...and a puppy in a ghost costume?! Stay right here on Camp Spoopy for all your Halloween scares!

programme.title: Cloud Babies
programme.desc: Cloud Babies is about four toddlers, Baba Pink, Baba Blue, Baba Yellow, and Baba Green whose job is to look after the sky and their Sky Friends, Sun, Moon, Rainbow, Fluffa Cloud and Little Star.

programme.title: Little Malabar
programme.desc: Little Malabar is very curious and very lucky. He gets to travel into the universe as if it were a big playground, and talk to planets and stars to understand where we come from and how our world took form.

programme.title: BabyRiki
programme.desc: The show covers all aspects of a child's life from physical well-being to cognitive and soft skills. The musical stories are based around age-appropriate experiences with educational concepts introduced in familiar surroundings and context for infants.

programme.title: Cry Babies Magic Tears

programme.title: Angry Planet | Italia Wild
programme.desc: Italy is one of the very few nations in the world that regularly gets three major extreme natural phenomena volcanos, flooding, and avalanches. Eastern flanks of the volcano to slip by up to two metres, and many houses on the flanks of the volcano experienced structural damage. The eruption also completely destroyed the Rifugio Sapienza, on the southern flank of the volcano. The Rifugio was the site of a cable car station which had previously been destroyed in the 1983 eruption both have now been rebuilt. The most recent eruption was in November 2006.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Kenya
programme.desc: Definitely our wildest episode so far. Heres the deal: Mt.Elgon is an 14,000 foot volcano in eastern Kenya. We propose a safari/ascent of the dormant volcano. Heres the first kicker:High on the the flanks of the volcano is Kitum Cave a cave created by the most unique form of erosion Elephant Erosion. For millennia elephants have been going into the cave to carve it out with thir tusks in order to eat the salty rock.Heres the second kicker: the cave is thought to be the home of the Ebola Marberg virus the worlds most deadly virus.So heres the plan: We are going enter the cave, at night, wearing full Bio-Hazard suits to protect us from the virus.

programme.title: Angry Planet | By Camel to Timbuktu
programme.desc: It is time for Angry Planet to do a serious desert episode. What better place to do it than this fabled city in the middle of the mighty Sahara Desert.This almost mythical place really does exist. And it really is still possible to travel there by camel caravan, riding the infamous Ships of the Desert. Extreme heat, dehydration, possible sand storms, frigid night temperatures and desert predators are our potential companions for the trip.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Indian Monsoon
programme.desc: In June of next year we plan to intercept the Monsoon as it hits southern India and makes its way north along the western shore past Goa and Mumbai up to Delhi.This most famous of torrential rainy seasons drops as much as 40 feet of water on parts of the parched sub-continent.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Java -Land of Fire
programme.desc: The most notorious volcanic explosion in history came from the small island of Krakatoa, off the coast of Java, The tiny island was pulverized and the giant explosion was felt half way around the world. Java is at the heart of the Ring of Fire, and so has seen many volcanoes, mud slides and earthquakes through its long history.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Iceland
programme.desc: The Land of Ice and Fire Iceland is a fascinating and ruggedly demanding country - a perfect subject for exploration by Angry Planet. The northern island nation has many of the wild features that we love volcanoes, glaciers, avalanches, mudslides, big waves, and extreme marine weather. All that plus weird red and green lights dancing around in the winter sky!

programme.title: WS Viral Wild | Ep. 4.4
programme.desc: Get ready to witness the mistakes and mischiefs of our wild friends

programme.title: WS Viral Wild | Ep. 4.10
programme.desc: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of the Winter

programme.title: The Latest in Ideas

programme.title: How The Brain Works
programme.desc: How does the brain -- a 3-pound snarl of nervous tissue -- create inspired inventions, the feeling of hunger, the experience of beauty, the sense of self? Researchers at the edge of science explain. 1) The brain science (and benefits) of ASMR | Craig Richard 2) How sound can hack your memory while you sleep | Greg Gage 3) What color is Tuesday? Exploring synesthesia - Richard E. Cytowic 4) What is melatonin -- and should you take it to fall asleep? | Matt Walker 5) Why helmets don't prevent concussions -- and what might | David Camarillo 6) This is your brain on air pollution | María Neira

programme.title: The Curious Traveler
programme.desc: Traveling to new destinations is always an experience. Insights and encouragement for you to think differently about the places you visit and the people you see. 1) My journey to thank all the people responsible for my morning coffee | A.J. Jacobs 2) The secret messages of Viking runestones | Jesse Byock 3) The ancient, earth-friendly wisdom of Mongolian nomads | Khulan Batkhuyag 4) My long walk across India for women's freedom | Srishti Bakshi 5) How germs travel on planes -- and how we can stop them | Raymond Wang 6) For more tolerance, we need more ... tourism? | Aziz Abu Sarah

programme.title: Laugh and Learn
programme.desc: You won't just laugh out loud -- these speakers will make you think twice. 1) Three ideas. Three contradictions. Or not. | Hannah Gadsby 2) A year in the life of one of Earth's weirdest animals | Gilad Bino 3) Stumbling towards intimacy: An improvised TED Talk | Anthony Veneziale 4) The health benefits of clowning around | Matthew A. Wilson 5) A highly scientific taxonomy of haters | Negin Farsad

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: What does it take to have a good life? Science and advice on how to live well, find meaning and be happy. 1) The art of stillness | Pico Iyer 2) The "End Of History" Illusion - Bence Nanay 3) What we can do to die well | Timothy Ihrig 4) Why does your voice change as you get older? - Shaylin A. Schundler 5) Lessons from the longest study on human development | Helen Pearson

programme.title: Art and Science of Love
programme.desc: A crash course on what it means to love -- and love well. 1) Want to change the world? Start by being brave enough to care | Cleo Wade 2) How long does it take to get over a breakup? | Mona Chalabi 3) The best way to apologize (according to science) | TED-Ed 4) A queer vision of love and marriage | Tiq Milan and Kim Katrin Milan 5) The money talk that every couple needs to have | Wendy De La Rosa 6) The myth of Hades and Persephone | Iseult Gillespie 7) Intimate photos of a senior love triangle | Isadora Kosofsky
